metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9804 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer overflow was observed in "commands_dump" functionin "tools/parser/csr.c" source file. The issue exists because "commands"array is overflowed by supplied parameter due to lack of boundary checks onsize of the buffer from frame "frm->ptr" parameter. This issue can betriggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in hcidumpcrash.

criterions.comment: bluez: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
